app_description: Translator Translate Speech allows to dictate and translate using your voice. It uses speech recognition technology and translates into 40 languages. Just use Translator and your voice to make conversation in any language. Time saving of Translator Translate Speech The benefit of Translator in saving time is tremendous. Compared to typing the savings in time of speech translation can be up to 80 . You also can translate while being in the car you just need to speak. Free test period of Translator Translate Speech You can use Translator Translate Speech right out of the box without any restrictions. If you want to use it for longer please upgrade to the Pro Version. This allows unlimited usage of the app ! Supported speech recognition and translation languages of Translator Translate Speech English Español Français Português Deutsch Italiano Nederlands Dansk Norsk bokmål Svenska Suomi Hindi Indonesia Tiếng Việt Türkçe Català Bahasa Melayu Hrvatski Magyar Polski Română Slovenčina čeština 粤语 ไทย 한국어 עברית ישראל ह न द 中文 русский العربية المملكة العربية السعودية 日本語 Ελληνικά 中文 上海话 українська Important notes concerning subscriptions All above Translator Translate Speech subscriptions renew within 24 hours before the current period ends and you will be charged through your iTunes account. Any unused portion of a free trial period if offered will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription. Manage or cancel your subscription from iTunes Account settings. See our Terms Conditions https: www.ibn software.com app terms conditions and Privacy Policy https: www.ibn software.com app privacy policy . If you like Translator Translate Speech please give a positive rating or even better a review. Any feedback is highly welcome. It helps to further develop Translator Translate Speech . Now enjoy to communicate in foreign languages !
